title: Agent Working Memory Session
description: Ephemeral session file created at task start and deleted at task end. Stores intermediate state for multi-step workflows within a single L2/L3 agent run. File path: agents/<agent_id>/memory/session.json

session_id.description: Unique identifier for this session (UUID v4).

agent_id.description: ID of the agent that owns this session (e.g. 'agent_review').

started_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session was created.

expires_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp after which the session is considered stale and may be garbage-collected. Default TTL: 30 minutes from started_at.

current_step.description: Name of the step currently being executed. Null when no step is in progress.

steps_completed.description: Ordered list of step names that have been completed successfully.

steps_failed.description: List of step names that failed. Does not block subsequent steps unless the orchestrator checks this field.

intermediate_results.description: Key-value store for intermediate results produced during the session. Keys are step names or logical labels; values are arbitrary JSON.

confidence.description: Running confidence score for the session output (0.0 = no confidence, 1.0 = full confidence). Updated after each evaluator call. Null if evaluator is not active.

metadata.description: Agent-specific or caller-specific metadata (e.g. PR number, branch name, correlation ID).

correlation_id.description: Correlates this session with an external event (e.g. ADO PR ID, n8n execution ID).
